You guys want me to host the glad38kr on my site? just the file.. that's all..
Bjorn Hansen <bhansen@...> wrote:-----BEGIN PGP SIGNED MESSAGE-----
Hash: SHA1

Since we seem to get a lot of these I went to see just how easy it was to find 
through google. Tried the following searches:
"Gladiator" - not surprisingly, snowstorm was not in the top ten results.
"fsgames gladiator" - snowstorm's page was the first result
"openglad" - again snowstorm was the first result
"gladiator fsgames" - snowstorm came up seventh, but several other related 
links were also present.  Interestingly enough, my unoficial gladiator page 
that I made years ago was the top result for this search ;P. I should 
probably update that w/ a link to snowstorm.

So it seems easy enough to find, I wonder why these people don't try five 
minutes of googling first. . .

On Wednesday 10 March 2004 08:23, alternate_dph@... wrote:
> I was hoping that somebody else would have answered this question by
> now.  Head to www.sourceforge.net/projects/snowstorm for a copy of
> OpenGlad.
